Classes in de.systemagmbh.interfaces.logger used by de.systemagmbh.common.logger
ISysDevelopmentLogSwitch
           To have the possiblility to make some log output besides the output of the finished program, the DEV_LOG constant should be used.
ISysLog
          The interface ISysLog has only the 'log' method.
ISysLogConstants
           All important constants for logging are defined here.

Classes in de.systemagmbh.interfaces.logger used by de.systemagmbh.components.logger
ISysDevelopmentLogSwitch
           To have the possiblility to make some log output besides the output of the finished program, the DEV_LOG constant should be used.
ISysLog
          The interface ISysLog has only the 'log' method.
ISysLogChecker
          Let's give a definition of a 'log check' first:
The 'log check' is the decision if a call of the log method has to be sent to a log writer or not.
ISysLogConstants
           All important constants for logging are defined here.
ISysLogFormatter
          Let's give a definition of a 'log format' first:
The 'log format' is the way the different information like date, log level, text is composed.
ISysLogger
          The interface ISysLogger defines all methods for working with a logger.
ISysLogWriter
          Let's give a definition of a 'log writer' first:
The 'log writer' is the instance of the logger, that writes a given text.
